name: Fresh Corn Fritters
author: MarthaWhite(R)
summary: Fresh corn kernels, crumbled bacon and sour cream bring delicious flavor to these quick deep-fried corn fritters.
ingredients: 1 (7 ounce) package Martha White® Sweet Yellow Cornbread & Muffin Mix
1 cup fresh corn kernels, coarsely chopped
1 cup Crisco® Pure Vegetable Oil, for frying
directions: Add sour cream, muffin mix, corn, bacon and ground red pepper
Heat 1-inch of oil in deep fat fryer or skillet to 350 degrees F
or until batter sizzles when dropped into oil
Gently drop batter by tablespoonfuls into hot oil
Cook 1 to 2 minutes or until bottom is golden brown
Turn and cook 1 to 2 minutes longer, or until golden brown
Remove to drain on paper towels
